{
     "id": "{{dealId}}",
    "clientId": {{clientId}},
    "recordType": "{{recordType}}",
    "name": "{{randomUpdatedDealName}}",
    "description": "{{randomDealDescription}}",
    "categoryId": "{{categoryId}}",
    "status": "{{dealStatus}}",
    "complianceStatus": "{{complianceStatus}}",
    "startDate": "{{startDate}}",

    "lastModifiedTimestamp": "{{lastModifiedTimestamp}}",

    "createdTimestamp": "{{createdTimestamp}}",

             "dataDestructionCompletedDate": "{{dataDestructionCompletedDate}}",
            "dataDestructionRequestedDate": "{{dataDestructionRequestedDate}}",
            "dataDestructionStatus": "{{dataDestructionStatus}}",
            "ndaCompletedDate": "{{ndaCompletedDate}}",
            "ndaRequestedDate": "{{ndaRequestedDate}}",
            "ndaStatus": "{{ndaStatus}}",
            "status": "{{companyStatus}}",
            "typeId": "{{typeId}}",
            "contactsUnderTent": [{
                "id": "{{contactsUnderTent1Id}}",
                "clientId": {{clientId}},
                "companyId": "{{company1Id}}",
                "lastModifiedByUserId": "{{lastModifiedByUserId}}",
                "lastModifiedTimestamp": "{{lastModifiedTimestamp}}",
                "createdByUserId": "{{createdByUserId}}",
                "createdTimestamp": "{{createdTimestamp}}",
                "name": "{{contactsUnderTentName}}",
                "title": "{{contactsUnderTentTitle}}",
                "email": "{{$randomEmail}}",
                "addedDate":"{{contactAddedDate}}"
                
            }
            ]},
            {
            "dealId": "{{dealId}}",
            "name": "ALARMFORCE INDS INC",
            "externalId": "3ec49d9c-5502-eb11-8140-000c29887906",
            "cusip": "01165L953",
            "isin": "CA01165L1022",
            "typeId": "03be7d38-c469-423c-a60a-dc7e66305fd9",
            "externalIdentifierType": "SecMasterSecurityId",
            "status": "Active",
            "ndaStatus": "NotAvailable",
            "ndaRequestedDate": null,
            "ndaCompletedDate": null,
            "dataDestructionStatus": "NotAvailable",
            "dataDestructionRequestedDate": null,
            "dataDestructionCompletedDate": null, 
            "contactsUnderTent": []}
    ],
    "dealMembers": [
        {
            "memberId": "{{memberIdRecordVisibility}}",
            "memberType": "{{memberTypeRecordVisibility}}",
             "id": "{{dealMemberVisibilityId}}",
            "clientId": {{clientId}},
            "dealId": "{{dealId}}",
            "lastModifiedByUserId": "{{lastModifiedByUserId}}",
            "lastModifiedTimestamp": "{{lastModifiedTimestamp}}",
            "createdByUserId": "{{createdByUserId}}",
            "createdTimestamp": "{{createdTimestamp}}"
        },
        
        {
            "memberId": "{{memberId}}",
            "memberType": "{{memberTypeInternalDealLead}}",
            "id": "{{dealMemberInternalId}}",
            "clientId": {{clientId}},
            "dealId": "{{dealId}}",
            "lastModifiedByUserId": "{{lastModifiedByUserId}}",
            "lastModifiedTimestamp": "{{lastModifiedTimestamp}}",
            "createdByUserId": "{{createdByUserId}}",
            "createdTimestamp": "{{createdTimestamp}}"
        }
    ],
    "restrictions": [
        {
            "name": "{{restrictionName}}",
            "endDate": "{{restrictionEndDate}}",
            "startDate": "{{startDate}}",
            "employeeRestriction": "{{employeeRestriction}}",
             "id": "{{restriction1Id}}",
            "clientId": {{clientId}},
            "dealId": "{{dealId}}",
            "isSyncToMarketAbuse": {{isSyncToMarketAbuse1}},
            "lastModifiedByUserId": "{{lastModifiedByUserId}}",
            "lastModifiedTimestamp": "{{lastModifiedTimestamp}}",
            "createdByUserId": "{{createdByUserId}}",
            "createdTimestamp": "{{createdTimestamp}}",

            "companyRestrictions": [{
                    "id": "{{companyRestrictions1Id}}",
                    "clientId": {{clientId}},
                    "restrictionId": "{{restriction1Id}}",
                    "companyId": "{{company1Id}}",

                    "lastModifiedTimestamp": "{{lastModifiedTimestamp}}",

                        }

        }
    ]
